00020 #include "LightWindow.h"
00021 
00022 LightWindow::LightWindow(QWidget *parent)
00023     : QWidget(parent)
00024 {
00025     setWindowTitle(tr("New Light"));
00026         setWindowFlags(Qt::Dialog);
00027         setMinimumSize(QSize(211, 313));
00028         setMaximumSize(QSize(211, 418));
00029 
00030         //Light Main Properties (name, color, type)
00031         groupLight = new QGroupBox(tr("Light Properties"));
00032 
00033         nameLight = new QLabel(tr("Name :"));
00034         nameLightEdit = new QLineEdit;
00035 
00036         diffuseColorLight = new QLabel(tr("Diffuse Color :"));
00037         diffuseColorLightBtn = new QPushButton(tr("Modify"));
00038 
00039         specularColorLight = new QLabel(tr("Specular Color :"));
00040         specularColorLightBtn = new QPushButton(tr("Modify"));
00041 
00042         typeLight = new QLabel(tr("Type :"));
00043         typeLightCombo = new QComboBox;
00044         typeLightCombo->addItem(tr("Point"));
00045         typeLightCombo->addItem(tr("Directional"));
00046         typeLightCombo->addItem(tr("Spotlight"));
00047         connect(typeLightCombo, SIGNAL(activated(QString)), this, SLOT(newTypeLight(QString)));
00048 
00049         mainPropertieslayout = new QGridLayout;
00050 
00051         mainPropertieslayout->addWidget(nameLight, 0, 0);
00052     mainPropertieslayout->addWidget(nameLightEdit, 0, 1);
00053 
00054         mainPropertieslayout->addWidget(diffuseColorLight, 1, 0);
00055     mainPropertieslayout->addWidget(diffuseColorLightBtn, 1, 1);
00056         mainPropertieslayout->addWidget(specularColorLight, 2, 0);
00057     mainPropertieslayout->addWidget(specularColorLightBtn, 2, 1);
00058 
00059         mainPropertieslayout->addWidget(typeLight, 3, 0);
00060     mainPropertieslayout->addWidget(typeLightCombo, 3, 1);
00061 
00062     groupLight->setLayout(mainPropertieslayout);
00063 
00065 
00066         //Light Position
00067         groupPos = new QGroupBox(tr("Light Position (optional)"));
00068 
00069         XPos = new QLabel(tr("X Position :"));
00070         XEditPos = new QLineEdit(tr("0.0"));
00071 
00072         YPos = new QLabel(tr("Y Position :"));
00073         YEditPos = new QLineEdit(tr("0.0"));
00074 
00075         ZPos = new QLabel(tr("Z Position :"));
00076         ZEditPos = new QLineEdit(tr("0.0"));
00077 
00078         posLayout = new QGridLayout;
00079 
00080         posLayout->addWidget(XPos, 0, 0);
00081     posLayout->addWidget(XEditPos, 0, 1);
00082 
00083         posLayout->addWidget(YPos, 1, 0);
00084     posLayout->addWidget(YEditPos, 1, 1);
00085 
00086         posLayout->addWidget(ZPos, 2, 0);
00087     posLayout->addWidget(ZEditPos, 2, 1);
00088 
00089     groupPos->setLayout(posLayout);
00090 
00092 
00093         //Light Direction
00094         groupDir = new QGroupBox(tr("Light Direction (optional)"));
00095 
00096         XDir = new QLabel(tr("X Direction :"));
00097         XEditDir = new QLineEdit(tr("0.0"));
00098 
00099         YDir = new QLabel(tr("Y Direction :"));
00100         YEditDir = new QLineEdit(tr("0.0"));
00101 
00102         ZDir = new QLabel(tr("Z Direction :"));
00103         ZEditDir = new QLineEdit(tr("0.0"));
00104 
00105         dirLayout = new QGridLayout;
00106 
00107         dirLayout->addWidget(XDir, 0, 0);
00108     dirLayout->addWidget(XEditDir, 0, 1);
00109 
00110         dirLayout->addWidget(YDir, 1, 0);
00111     dirLayout->addWidget(YEditDir, 1, 1);
00112 
00113         dirLayout->addWidget(ZDir, 2, 0);
00114     dirLayout->addWidget(ZEditDir, 2, 1);
00115 
00116     groupDir->setLayout(dirLayout);
00117 
00119 
00120         //Buttons
00121         groupBtn = new QGroupBox;
00122         groupBtn->setFlat(true);
00123 
00124     okBtn = new QPushButton(tr("&Ok"));
00125     cancelBtn = new QPushButton(tr("&Cancel"));
00126     connect(cancelBtn, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(close()));
00127 
00128         btnLayout = new QGridLayout;
00129 
00130         btnLayout->addWidget(okBtn, 0, 0);
00131     btnLayout->addWidget(cancelBtn, 0, 1);
00132 
00133     groupBtn->setLayout(btnLayout);
00135 
00136         lightLayout = new QGridLayout;
00137 
00138         lightLayout->addWidget(groupLight, 0, 0);
00139     lightLayout->addWidget(groupPos, 1, 0);
00140         lightLayout->addWidget(groupBtn, 2, 0);
00141 
00142     setLayout(lightLayout);
00143 }
00144 
00145 void LightWindow::newTypeLight(QString type)
00146 {
00147         if(type == "Point"){
00148                 resize(211, 313);
00149                 //Hide Direction Properties
00150                 groupDir->hide();
00151                 lightLayout->removeWidget(groupDir);
00152                 //Show Position Properties
00153                 lightLayout->addWidget(groupPos, 1, 0);
00154                 if(groupPos->isHidden())
00155                         groupPos->show();
00156         }
00157         else if(type == "Directional"){
00158                 resize(211, 313);
00159                 //Hide Position Properties
00160                 groupPos->hide();
00161                 lightLayout->removeWidget(groupPos);
00162                 //Show Directions Properties
00163                 lightLayout->addWidget(groupDir, 1, 0);
00164                 lightLayout->addWidget(groupBtn, 2, 0);
00165                 if(groupDir->isHidden())
00166                         groupDir->show();
00167         }
00168         else if(type == "Spotlight"){
00169                 resize(211, 418);
00170                 //Show Position Properties
00171                 lightLayout->addWidget(groupPos, 1, 0);
00172                 if(groupPos->isHidden())
00173                         groupPos->show();
00174                 //Show Directions Properties
00175                 lightLayout->addWidget(groupDir, 2, 0);
00176                 lightLayout->addWidget(groupBtn, 3, 0);
00177                 if(groupDir->isHidden())
00178                         groupDir->show();
00179         }
00180 }
